ThingDef.label: common single bed
ThingDef.description: A simple Imperial bed. A common sight on any world of the Imperium of Man, for even the most devoted require rest. \n\nManpower was, is, and will always be the greatest strength of the Imperium of Man.

ThingDef.label: Prisoner bed
ThingDef.description: Not quite a bed, but a position of restraint. From here, a heretic's penitence begins. \n\nThe Imperium brooks no dissent. "Heresy" includes not only worship of the Chaos Gods, but also any action or belief that works against the Imperium.

ThingDef.label: Noble single bed
ThingDef.description: An ornate bed, suitable for the highborn of the Imperium of Man - the nobility. \n\nThe highborn live a life entirely different to that of common Imperial citizens - a life of immense wealth, power, and influence. That is not to say it is without its own dangers - shunning by their peers, assassins in the night, and the temptations of the Chaos Gods in the form of cults and cliques.

That is not to say it is without its own dangers - shunning by their peers, assassins in the night, and the temptations of the Chaos Gods in the form of cults and cliques.

ThingDef.label: medicae bed
ThingDef.description: A medical bed, moderately equipped with medical paraphernalia for use by a trained medicae. Patients resting on it can look forward to improved medical outcomes. \n\nThose resting on this bed should consider themselves lucky. On some worlds of the Imperium, a man with an infected wound can only look forward to a crude amputation with a dirty bonesaw - and, probably, a slow death.
